nodes.text: A suspended-animation casket was a technology that allowed for the extended preservation of a living being in a state of Suspended animation. After Imperial officer Sander Delvardus's mistress, Seledra-Zin, was injured during an altercation with Delvardus, and he arranged for a suspended-animation casket for her to be installed in his personal quarters aboard his Star Destroyer, the Brilliant.
